createAccount.heading: Create Account
createAccount.alertText: Why have a Dataverse account? To create your own collection and customize it, add datasets, or request access to restricted files.

hasValidTokenButNotLinkedAccount.heading: Account Not Linked
hasValidTokenButNotLinkedAccount.alertText:
You're almost there! Sign-in worked, but we didn't find a linked account.
 Complete your registration to create your own collection and customize it, add datasets, or request access to restricted files.

aboutPrefilledFields:
Some fields in this form are pre-filled with information from your identity provider and cannot be changed at this stage.
This ensures consistency and security. Please complete the remaining fields to finish your registration.

username.label: Username
username.description: Between 2-60 characters, and can use “a-z”, “0-9”, “_” for your username.
username.helperText: Create a valid username of 2 to 60 characters in length containing letters (a-Z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), underscores (_), and periods (.).

firstName.label: Given Name
firstName.description: The first name or name you would like to use for this account.

lastName.label: Family Name
lastName.description: The last name you would like to use for this account.

emailAddress.label: Email
emailAddress.description: A valid email address you have access to in order to be contacted

affiliation.label: Affiliation
affiliation.description: The organization with which you are affiliated.

position.label: Position
position.description: Your role or title at the organization you are affiliated with; such as staff, faculty, student, etc.

termsAccepted.label: I have read and accept the Dataverse General Terms of Use as outlined above.
termsAccepted.description: The terms and conditions for using the application and services.
termsAccepted.required: You must agree to the terms of use.
termsAccepted.noTerms: There are no Terms of Use for this Dataverse installation.
